text: Anthurium bucayanum is a species of plant in the arum family, Araceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. It is an epiphyte which grows in coastal forests. It is threatened by habitat fragmentation.Benavides, G. & Pitman, N. 2003. Anthurium bucayanum. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2015.2. Downloaded on 07 September 2015. ==References== bucayanum Category:Endangered plants Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Anthurium bucayanum
